F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Cartridge for automatic quality control application of the Rapid point 500 or equivalent

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Heparinized syringes of 1ml with ± 0.2 % deviation, applicable to Rapid point 500 or equivalent

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Thermal paper width 57mm ± 0.5 % and minimum length 40m, applicative to Rapid point 500 or equivalent

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Hyparinated capillary tubes of 100 micro-liters applicative to device Rapid point 500 or equivalent

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Detector for coagulum application of Rapid point 500 or equivalent

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Dilucion Reagents applicative on hematological counter Medonic M20 max 20 L or equivalent

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Medical M 20 hematologic ligament reagent maximum 5 L, or equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Blood control with normal values, including bar-codes for intake for control values in the system, applied to the Medonic M 20 hematologic counter or the equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Measuring cartridge for gas analysis compatible with GEM PREMIER 3000 or equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Immunochemical rapid test for the determination of Procalcitonin in serum and plasma, for the diagnosis and control of bacterial infections and sepsis within max.30min.
Each test should include:
— a test,
— a reference card, and,
— a single-use pipette.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: A dilution solution compatible to a Beckman Coulter DXH500 hematologic analyzer or equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Ligament reagent for determining 5 partial differentiation compatible to the Beckman Coulter DXH500 hematologic analyzer or equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Detergent for cleaning Beckman Coulter DXH500 hematologic analyzer or equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: IMUNOCHROMATOGRAPHIC TESTS, CERTRIDES, REAGENTS AND CONSUMED MATERIAL FOR ACCESSORIES AND CHEMATOLOGICAL ANALYSORS

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: blood control Normal level compatible with the Beckman Coulter DXH500 Haematological analyzer or equivalent (for WBC, RBC, HGB, HCT, PLT, LYM, MON, GRA).

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: Public Health Institution University Clinic for Pediatric Surgery Ul

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — a statement of the economic operator proving that in the last 5 years has had an effective sentence for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering; - Certificate that a bankruptcy procedure has not been initiated by the competent body,
— certificate that a liquidation procedure has not been initiated by the competent body,
— certificate of paid taxes, benefits, and other public duties, issued by the competent body in the country where the economic operator is registered,

— certificate from the Registry of penalties for committed acts of crime by legal entities that the economic operator has not been issued an additional penalty of a ban on participating in procedures for a public call for bids, for awarding public procurement contracts and for contracts on public-private partnership,

— certificate from the Registry of penalties for committed acts of crime by legal entities that the economic operator has not been issued an additional penalty of a temporary or permanent ban on performing a certain activity.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: 2.3.1 To prove the capability of doing professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity as proof that it is registered as a legal entity for the activity related to the subject of the contract or evidence that it belongs to professional association in accordance with the regulations of the country where it is registered.

2.3.2 Certificate issued by the competent authority for the fulfillment of specific conditions for the activity prescribed under the law relating to the subject matter of the contract. The decision that is registered in the register of legal entities for wholesale of medical devices issued by the Agency for medicines and medical supplies under the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices Article 126 paragraph 2.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: The economic operator proves the fulfillment of the minimum requirements of sub-item 2.4.1 by submitting a Decision (valid) that gives an approval for placing a medical device on the territory of the Republic of Macedonia, or an approval for parallel import or temporary importation for parallel import issued by the Ministry of Health/Agency for Drugs of the Republic of Macedonia. Macedonia.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: 2.4.1 In order to qualify as capable of carrying out the relevant public procurement contract in terms of its technical or professional capability, the economic operator must meet the following minimum requirements:

— the subject of the procurement - tests, reagents, and consumables should be approved for placing on the market in the territory of the Republic of Macedonia in accordance with the Law on medicinal products and medical devices, ie they are registered or approved for parallel import.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To participate in the electronic auction the economic operator needs to register on ESPP (Electronic System for Public Procurement):
— tender documentation, forms, and information for announcement number 26/2017 are provided on the same website.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: University clinic of pediatric surgery st. Majka Tereza number 17 1000 Skopje
